column1: Officer while on patrol was approached on a report that an unwanted guest was sleeping in the building. Officer approached
the individual and conducted a field interview. The individual was run for wants/warrants with negative results. The
individual was then issued a verbal trespass warning for all Harvard University property and sent on their way.
Officer dispatched to take a report of an attempted theft in the building.
Officer dispatched to monitor a demonstration that went without incident.
Officer dispatched to take a report of an individual who may not having authorization to be in the building using an
Officer dispatched to take a report of tagging/graffiti done to the side of the building.
